title: Peter Paul Simmons on activism - identify context

content.question: Which of the following best describes the historical context in which the speech was delivered?

choices.label: A generation of Africans known as ladinos served as intermediaries across the Atlantic.
Afro-descendant women embraced Queen Idia as a symbol of resistance and leadership.
Black visual and performance artists repurposed the iconography of slave ships.
Many in the African diaspora came to believe that ending enslavement by appealing to ethics had failed.

content.answer: Many in the African diaspora came to believe that ending enslavement by appealing to ethics had failed.
